name: helloreact
description: Example set-up for reactjs with webpack for public reference

scripts.dev-static: cp -f src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -f src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico && webpack-dev-server --content-base dist --hot true --progress --colors --history-api-fallback
scripts.dev: npm run start-backend & cp -f src/index.html dist/index.html & cp -f src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico & webpack-dev-server --host 0.0.0.0 --content-base-target 'http://127.0.0.1:5000' --hot true --progress --colors
scripts.build: cp -f src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -f src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico  && webpack -p --config webpack.prod.config.js

author: Calvin Cheng
